title: Official Project Start
description: Lit project officially started after conceptual discussions with Gemini. `lit-app` repository created on GitHub. Initial GDD structure (v1) created on GitHub Wiki. Front-end 100% open source.

title: Visual Timeline Created
description: Developed the Changelog page (`/changelog`) with React component, reading data from JSON. Implemented 'Liquid Glass' style. Created local HTML tool for adding entries.

title: Publish first landing page
description: Temporary landing page with usefull links and changelog. Landing Page 100% open source.

title: Update Default Icon to Provisory Fav icon
description: Update Default Icon to Provisory Fav icon

title: Add Vercel Analytics component
description: Add Vercel Analytics component to track if organic views are comming to validate ideias.

title: Create first temporary icon
description: 2D detailed pixel art temporary Icon for Avatar frame and trying to define the art style of the project.
